item.title: Far-Right Health Care Companies Made Millions Prescribing Unproven Covid Remedies
item.description: As the national push to vaccinate people against Covid-19 continues, hundreds of thousands of hacked documents show how a group of doctors is explicitly pushing unproven and potentially dangerous alternatives on people hesitant to follow public health ... Feed: https://rss.acast.com/intercepted-with-jeremy-scahill

item.title: MetAnon Ep265 â€“ Shifting the Goalposts
item.description: In our 265th regular episode of Metagamers Anonymous, a cast of GMs discusses the art of adapting the game to the players ideas and expectations. We also talk about different GMing styles and challenges, relationships with players, Feed: https://prismatictsunami.com/feed/podcast
